info.secondPart: with experience in frontend technologies such as HTML, CSS, preprocessors such as SCSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, Git, and GitHub, with solid knowledge in designing and creating pages with React and libraries such as Next, Redux, Styled-Components, among others.

about.title: About me

description.firstPart: Hi there! I'm Jefferson Vinicius Silva dos Santos, and I'm
description.secondParagraph: I'm interested in high-impact projects that allow me to combine different frameworks and technologies, culminating in delivering added value to its users.
description.thirdParagraph: I am an education enthusiast, so I am constantly learning foreign languages like English, and French, programming languages, and public speaking, as they are tools that will help me share with more people and grow together.

about.studies: Shortly before graduating from Jorge Matute Remus Polytechnic Computer Engineering, I began my studies at Platzi and I decided to adopt their motto:

focus.past: Since then, I've focused on learning everything about web development, and I've had the privilege of working with amazing people and companies.
focus.main: My main focus is building accessible, performant and awesome websites. I'm always looking for new challenges.

technologies.title: Here are some technologies and tools that I have been working with:

career.title: Frontend Developer
description: Platzi Master is an intensive and elite program, where only 0.01% of the best students on the platform are accepted, to turn them into the next generation of the best professionals in the technology industry, with 1:1 support from specialized and recognized technical trainers in the industry. ðŸ’»

I am an education enthusiast, so I am constantly learning foreign languages like English, and French, programming languages, and public speaking, as they are tools that will help me share with more people and grow together. ðŸ’š

schools.name: Escuela PoltÃ©cnica Ing. Jorge Matute Remus

career.title: Professional Computer Technologist
description: I studied the career of computer science, where I learned the basics of various programming languages and web development.
I also did internships and professional projects in which I was able to develop my skills and practice my knowledge of web development.

positions.title: React Developer
positions.description: I worked on several projects from scratch, also adding new features and fixing bugs in existing projects.
bullets: Actively fixing critical bugs in the client's platform.
Added new features to the client's platform.
Worked on the base configuration and development of new projects.

positions.title: Quality Check
positions.description: Contributed to the quality assurance of the content, working together with different teams to deliver a high quality product used by more than 3 million students in Latin America.
bullets: Providing continuous feedback to the team to iterate on better results.
Reducing the rate of student-reported content errors by 66%.
Reducing the rate of students affected by content errors by 68%.

positions.title: Content Creator SEO
positions.description: Contributed to the creation, revision, and improvement of the content in the platform classes, mainly in technology courses. Creation and continuous improvement of the content for the platform classes.
bullets: Generate quality content for Platzi students.
Improved the SEO of the platform.
Creating and improving content.

positions.title: Web Developer
positions.description: Developing a web application for the La Paz, Bolivia mayor's office. Using technologies like JavaScript, SCSS, storybook, and some JavaScript libraries like React, Next.js, besides using Redux-Saga, and other libraries.
bullets: Working on the creation and implementation of the logic of the modules for the users.
Creating flows of citizen participation: voting, creation of proposals, etc.
Connecting views with REST APIs.

positions.title: Frontend Developer
positions.description: Development and maintenance of code for internal and external client websites using HTML, CSS, Sass, JavaScript, React, Firebase, WordPress, and more.
bullets: Sites manually tested across multiple browsers and mobile devices to ensure cross-browser compatibility and responsiveness.
Developing high quality websites for internal and external clients.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Throughout my career as a Frontend, I have had the opportunity of working on incredible and challenging projects. Here are some projects that I would like to share.

list.name: Movies App
list.description: I developed this project with the API Rest consumption course trilogy at Platzi, and using TMDB API.

list.name: Rick and Morty
list.description: I made this project fetching data from the Rick and Morty API, with react and an typescript, using the best practices and optimization techniques.

list.name: GitHub Profile
list.description: I developed this project while learning Material UI, fetching GitHub's API to get the user's information and repositories.

list.name: Portfolio
list.description: This is the portfolio that you are seeing right now, I made it with react and typescript, and I used sass for the styles.

list.name: ToDo App
list.description: This is a project that looks pretty simple, but it has a lot of features, such as: dark/light mode, use of local storage, a search bar, drag and drop, and it was developed with react sass and typescript.

list.name: Platzi Badges
list.description: This is a project where I started learning about react, I made also a REST API to make, modify, and delete the badges, you can also register your own badge!

list.name: Music Player
list.description: Vanilla JavaScript music player, this is one of my very first projects using JavaScript.

list.name: Simon Says
list.description: Game Simon Says, with Vanilla JavaScript. Can you pass all 15 levels? Challenge your memory!

description.current: I am always looking for new challenges and job opportunities.
description.invite: If you have any questions about my services, or just want to say hello, feel free to contact me.
